long_description: Part of the Quiksilver Amphibian series, the boys' F.A.A. Amphibian Shorts give him the clean looks of casual everyday shorts with the action of a high-performance board short. 4-way-stretch fabric lets him move freely and dries superfast. Styling lets him go easily from beach to dinner. Zip-fly with a single snap; belt loops. Hand pockets and 2 rear welt pockets. Quiksilver F.A.A. Amphibian Shorts for boys are made from recycled polyester with spandex for great stretch.
short_description: Part of the Quiksilver Amphibian series, the boys' F.A.A. Amphibian Shorts give him the clean looks of casual everyday shorts with the action of a high-performance board short.
